name: Intro
_source: speak;Simon;I guess monsters are the least of our problems.
s;Simon;The route through here is overrun with bandits.
s;Kajal;Lord Vesner's lands have been ravaged by bandits like these.
s;Kajal;This road has been overtaken by a brute of a man named Gustav.
s;Kajal;Now it's nearly impossible to traverse deeper into Lord Vesner's territory.
s;Simon;Do you think that army, those Wandering Knights, made it through?
speak;Kajal;Well, not all of them.{w} Look.
speak;Kajal;It looks like some rations fell off their convoy.
speak;Simon;Must've been a rough ride through if bandits were on their heels the entire time.
speak;Kajal;Well, bandits are only one concern here.
speak;Simon;You mean the undead creatures brought back to life by Old Vesner's festering corpse?
speak;Kajal;I will...{w} excuse your blasphemy for now.{w}{br}But yes, the reborn soldiers may pose a threat for unbelievers like you.
speak;Simon;You make it sound like you'll be safe.
speak;Kajal;I've lived faithfully amidst the miasma for long enough that Lord Vesner will protect me.
speak;Kajal;Anyway, the reborn may be useful to us yet.{w}{br}If we stand nearby and push the crates of rations into the swamp...
speak;Kajal;They'll stir from their slumber and attack.{w}{br}We may be able to pit them against our adversaries here, if we're lucky.
speak;Simon;I like where your head's at.
s;Simon;It also might be worth investigating those ruins.
s;Simon;We might find something valuable that the bandits left behind.

speak;Narrator;Some enemies may be too difficult for your current team.{w}{br}If you feel frustrated, try using the Exit option from the preparations screen.{w}{br}You can always return to a map later.;StyleNid=hint
